text: Herman Kleppa (born 17 September 1996) is a Norwegian footballer who plays as a central midfielder. ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Norwegian footballers Category:Eliteserien players Category:Viking FK players Category:Norwegian First Division players Category:FK Vidar players Category:Sandnes Ulf players Category:Egersunds IK players Category:Association football midfielders
title: Herman Kleppa
